item.title: #4 Clock Logic
item.description: Disclaimer : I’m following the amazing series of videos from Ben Eater using his electronic built kit for the 8 bits computer. This series of post is only there for my personnal understanding about electronic and this amazing project. I ablsolutly recommand you to watch his series of videos instead of reading this post of course ! Play-List-Link Disclaimer 2 : I’m not an expert at all, Just a beginner who wants to learn, I stay tuned for corrections or advice!
